original_text: And he will bring upon you again all the diseases of Egypt, of which you were afraid, and they shall cling to you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네가 두려워하던 애굽의 모든 질병을 네게로 가져다가 네 몸에 들어붙게 하실 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he will bring upon you again all the diseases of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다시 너희에게 이집트의 모든 질병을 가져오리니

sentences.original_text: and they shall cling to you
